DataElement.preferredName: Patient Confidential Current Address Additional Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: This data item provides the ability to store additional address information such as the name of a place or facility, a nursing home, or the name of an apartment complex.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Additional address information such as the name of a place or facility, a nursing home, or the name of an apartment complex.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.:The ethical principle or legal right that a physician or other health professional will hold secret all information relating to a patient, unless the patient gives consent permitting disclosure.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Treatment of information so that it is not divulged in ways that are inconsistent with the understanding of the original disclosure. Particularly, the ethical principle or legal right that a physician or other health professional will hold secret all information relating to a patient, unless the patient gives consent permitting disclosure.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.:The location at which an organization or person can be reached. (from American Heritage Dictionary):Added; extra. (from American Heritage Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.
A standardized representation of the location of a person, business, building, or organization.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: all components of an address, including building number, street name and type, city, state, postal code, and country.

DataElementConcept.origin: NAACCR:North American Association of Central Cancer Registries

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The location at which an organization or person can be reached. (from American Heritage Dictionary)_Added; extra. (from American Heritage Dictionary)_Text; the words of something written.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual entities required by NCI operations and systems. Includes administrative, financial, organizational and quasi-scientific concepts required for NCI operations and systems.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The location at which an organization or person can be reached. (from American Heritage Dictionary):Added; extra. (from American Heritage Dictionary):Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: A standardized representation of the location of a person, business, building, or organization.

ValueDomain.origin: NAACCR:North American Association of Central Cancer Registries
ValueDomain.changeDescription: 08/17/2011 - tc - Change VD max length from 40 to 60 as per V12.

ClassificationSchemes.longName: Division of Cancer Control and Population Sciences

ReferenceDocuments.name: Addr Current--Supplementl Description
ReferenceDocuments.description: This can be used to generate a follow-up inquiry, and must correspond to other fields in the current address. If the patient has multiple tumors, the current address should be the same.

ReferenceDocuments.name: NAACCR 12.1, Data Stds/Dict.
ReferenceDocuments.description: For additional details see NAACCR, Standards for Cancer Registries Volume II, Version 12.1 Data Standards and Data Dictionary (6/2010)

ReferenceDocuments.name: NAACCR 16, Data Stds/Dict.
ReferenceDocuments.description: For additional details see NAACCR, Standards for Cancer Registries Volume II, Version 16 Data Standards and Data Dictionary (01/2016)

DataElement.origin: NAACCR:North American Association of Central Cancer Registries
DataElement.changeDescription: 08/17/2011 - tc - Updated VD max char to 60 as per V12
